nodes.text: The Model 3 Imperial Army electrobinoculars were a model of electrobinoculars produced by the Tagge Company for use providing optical enhancement to the Galactic Empire's Imperial Army. They were available in the period following the Battle of Yavin between the Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and cost 250.
The Model 3 Imperial Army electrobinoculars were first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
